text.section:
Subject to subsection (c) of this section, the Board shall issue a license to any applicant who:
Meets the requirements of this subtitle; and
Pays a license fee set by the Board.

The Board shall include on each license that the Board issues a license designation as:
Licensed electrologist; or
Licensed electrology instructor.

section.section: The Board may not issue a license if the criminal history record information required under § 8-303 of this title has not been received.
